Reviews.Author: Hall901
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a 6 year old boy.  it is has survived a few drops already. Very happy with this purchase
Reviews.Title: kid friendly

Reviews.Author: Tainu Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Slow to a halt, doesn't do and perform like a tablet. Like to return it if possible, it's a rip off.
Reviews.Title: Fault advertising.

Reviews.Author: Russell Stahlke
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a quality tablet.  Apps run fine and so do movies.  Of course it is not as fast as a more expensive tablet, but it gets the job done.
Reviews.Title: Cool tablet

Reviews.Author: peggy Daniel
Reviews.Content: This put a smile on my great grand daughters face and now we cant get her to stop playing with it she loves this and so do i
Reviews.Title: Great grandchild's Gift

Reviews.Author: nadene
Reviews.Content: I bought two of this product a little over a week ago for my children and so far I have not seen much problem with them. The memory is limited though and sometimes the tablet does not respond to the touch; we have to jab at the screen sometimes for it to respond.
Reviews.Title: Genesis 7" Tablet

Reviews.Author: Leslie Jones McCloud
Reviews.Content: This tablet is decent for the money. I purchased my tablet at Walmart for $59 and at first I could not download the Instagram app on it. I even wrote the developer. Then I figured out how to do it.Go here: [...]Anyway, the memory filled up quickly, even after moving many apps to the sd card (internal). I thought I was putting the apps on the external sd mini card but I don't know how to get them over there and the instructions that came with this product are bare bones. Not big on customer support, I guess. I can listen to sounds easier while falling asleep,I can take this in the kitchen with me for cooking and watching ON Demand videos and cooking vids so it is handy for the $$. I have not had it long but it is useful.
Reviews.Title: I want new headphones and a car charger

Reviews.Author: ROBERT E. DUNCAN
Reviews.Content: I HAVE USED THIS PRODUCT FOR OVER 3 WEEKS AND I AM COMPLETELY SATIFIED. HAS A NUMBER OF GREAT FEATURES AND IS VERY PORTABLE. THERE ARE SOME APPS OUT THERE WHICH WILL NOT WORK WITH UNIT BUT MAY WORK IN FUTURE ONCE THE THE APPS ARE FURTHER DEVELOPED. I ALSO LIKE IT'S EXPANDABLE SD MEMORY CAPABILITY. THE PRICE IS RIGHT AND I'M THINKING OF PURCHASING ANOTHER UNIT VERY SOON.
Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT

Reviews.Author: Nema
Reviews.Content: This Tablet is easy to learn and the ease of finding what you need to know is wonderful! I would recommened this Tablet to anyone who wants a great Tablet!
Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet!

Reviews.Author: Olatunde Stephen
Reviews.Content: I USE IT TO LISTEN TO MUSICLISTEN TO GOSPEL.... PREACHING FROM TBNTHOUGH.. I WILL UPGRADE IT SOON ....
Reviews.Title: I LIKE IT

Reviews.Author: D. Andrew Gelsinger
Reviews.Content: A great kids tablet.  A little slow and clunky sometimes - but for the price, you can't beat it!  Pretty tough too!  This thing has taken a beating from an almost 2 year old, and still keeps ticking!
Reviews.Title: Nice

Reviews.Author: Nancy L "nll"
Reviews.Content: I am a senior citizen interested in keeping up with technology. This tablet has been user friendly and not difficult to learn its operation. I would recommend to other seniors, ie beginners and tech challenged.
Reviews.Title: Great for beginners

Reviews.Author: Rufus
Reviews.Content: I want to start by saying that I almost never post reviews of products but this time I had to. I bought 3 of these items because they are inexpensive and I thought it would be a good way to evaluate if I wanted to venture into buying tablets for me and my two children. I have waited a while to post this to try and decide if I was being to critical of the product or if it was just that bad. After a lot of thinking, it is just that bad.The only positive thing I can say about this product is it is cheap. After that there is a long list of negatives.Out of the box it just feels cheap and like it could break at any second. After powering it on you want to make the screen brighter but realize quickly that the brightness is already turned all the way up. After that comes the realization that the display looks grainy and distorted, it is actually very hard to read almost anything. The touchscreen is horrible! It is at times over sensitive or under sensitive even with the same amount of pressure applied each time and will register touches a fingertip below where you touch it and you end with things you never meant to open opening or things not opening at all. The RAM for it is so small that after receiving it and updating Google services, you cannot add any apps to the tablet that cant be moved to the SD card right away. Even if you remove some of the Google required apps that cant be moved to the SD card they get downloaded again the next time you need an update. So it is slow, very slow and a lot of apps hang up when you try to open them.Then on one of them the mini USB port came detached from the motherboard when simply removing the power cord. Now I am stuck with one useless tablet and two that are in the word of my children.. Horrible. In fact on of my children refuses to even try to play games on his because he gets so frustrated by how poor it performs. I am trying to work with Ematic to return the broken one and possibly return the other two since they are so dysfunctional. I will update this as info come available but please save your money or invest a few more dollars in a better tablet.
Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on this. It is not worth it.

Reviews.Author: Z.Dobson
Reviews.Content: "Ematic Product Review" This tablet is impressive for 50$ it does everything that was promised, all the bad reviews are incorrect I haven't experienced none of the problems people had listed.The sound quality is perfect, with Google chrome provided web browser I can easily access any website.I highly recommend this tablet for busy people,Its affordable and enjoyable!
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: only able to install 4 apps before the 512mb is full and sd card is useless cannot add to it. a child would not like this.
Reviews.Title: Bad

Reviews.Author: jose luis guerrero
Reviews.Content: all right, I'm satisfied with the product, I recommend it, do not hesitate to buy this product, the best I've bought this seaso
Reviews.Title: i love

Reviews.Author: Uncle Charlie
Reviews.Content: This is a 'starter' unit- strictly entry-level stuff.  Very, very slow to respond to touch, internet use, etc.  Good for someone just learning keyboard basics and general move-around on a tablet.  Sometimes, the screen does not respond at all to touch.  But, this is the exception.  Not recommended for experienced users who are accustomed to speed, functionality.
Reviews.Title: kids only

Reviews.Author: Farley Philogene
Reviews.Content: Three days in the power button stopped working. It has to be turned on by plugging it into the charger.
Reviews.Title: Oh well

Reviews.Author: Michael Perrone
Reviews.Content: Have used this item, seems to be okay, bought it to get used to using a tablet. Since I don't own another tablet, can't give a comparison or rating. It's okay for a beginner!
Reviews.Title: 7" Google Play Android 4.1 Ematic Genesis Prime 4GB HD Multimedia Tablet w/ WiFi

Reviews.Author: Peggy A Mosorjak
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an inexpensive tablet for music, games and some quick browsing & email. Works really good for the price. I've used other inexpensive tablets and this one is better than most. It comes with Google play which is a big plus. Of course its a bit slow and doesn't have a lot of storage, but for $60 it does everything a friend's $200 tablet does just a bit slower. I would recommend this for someone that is looking for an inexpensive tablet and doesn't mind it being a bit sluggish. If you're looking for something to run like an ipad, save your money, but for the price, this tablet does the job.
Reviews.Title: Works good for the price

Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: The usb charging port wouldn't make a connection and then it fell out. It was only a day old when it died :(
Reviews.Title: R.I.P.

Reviews.Author: KipOc
Reviews.Content: I needed a tablet that could access the Playstore, this fit the bill.  I have had it mounted on a wall in a factory running a time-clock app for a couple of months. It is powered on 24 hrs, 7 days a week.  I have never had a problem with it, never had to restart it.  Granted, it's only running a single app.  It is SLOW so regular users may be frustrated by that.
Reviews.Title: Fills a need

Reviews.Author: R.AZARUDEEN
Reviews.Content: There is no way to connect the internet other than the wifi, i dislike this item.No camera on both sides..No GSM facilityNo mobile networks facility.Only one port available.Headset was not desirable.
Reviews.Title: Poor design

Reviews.Author: Peter D. White "pedrobot"
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these for my sons for Christmas.  Right out of the box, one wouldn't turn on - the on/off button was broken.  Sent it back for a replacement.  Replacement unit arrived, and its charger was broken.  Attempted to charge unit using the charger from the other one, but it would only operate if plugged into the wall - the battery wouldn't hold a charge at all.  The other one would only intermittently connect to my home wi-fi (all my other devices work great).  To have 3 different manufacturing problems on 3 different units is a real concern.  In the brief time that I did have one of these things working, I found the performance to be iffy, and the lack of storage space appalling.  You cannot install apps on an installed SD card on this device, so ultimately you have less than 2 GB total for downloaded apps.  I returned all of them, and will try another product.
Reviews.Title: Poorly manufactured, 3 units, 3 different problems

Reviews.Author: Courtney Mixer
Reviews.Content: Website for product does not reply, no FAQ section, even though it states they do. Can not download ANY apps and can not restart the system. The cheapest tablet I have ever seen. DOES NOT WORK. Keeps saying Android processing fails.  Just ordered the kindle at this point and hope it actually works! You will be disappointed if you order this, the processor/software is flawed from the get go!
Reviews.Title: Does not work within 2 hours of running

Reviews.Author: al
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a backup to my wife's Kindle when she had to send in her Kindle for repairs. This thing is pretty slow. I wasn't expecting much after doing all the research on it, and I wasn't disappointed. But if you are expecting something useful as a tablet, you may regret the purchase. Not a lot of internal storage and not a lot of speed. It can barely run Pandora which is the secondary purpose I got it for. As an e-reader, it gets the job done.Would have given it 3 stars but the battery does not hold a charge for a long time when not in use. This may or may not be specific to my device. If you are looking for a cheap 7 inch tablet under $100, I would suggest spending a little more on a refurbished name-brand tablet.
Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: This tablet works as expected for the price. My personal one's touch screen is delayed and hard to touch, the memory is small, and apps generally run slow. The other one that was purchased does not work at all anymore. It worked the same as mine for a week, then it stopped charging and the same day that it stopped charging the charging port fell completely out when the charger was unplugged. I probably would not order again.
Reviews.Title: Don't do it.

Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: About the end of first month it stopped charging regularly. At the end of the second month it wont charge at all anymore. It was a bad purchase.
Reviews.Title: two months....

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Treat the people around you ...
Reviews.Content: I've got the 'priceblink' app on my browser & whenI looked at this page 'priceblink' popped up to notify me that this is $60 at Walmart- I hope that helps you
Reviews.Title: $59.99 at Walmart website

Reviews.Author: Sassy Mama
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my 6 yr old who broke his first tablet. This one seems to be a bit more 'kid-proof'. The price is GREAT. Includes everything a kid needs in a tablet.
Reviews.Title: Good for kids

Reviews.Author: Tee B
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my niece's birthday.  After reading some of the negative reviews, I decided to give it a chance anyway.  I ordered it a month in advance of her birthday in order to test it to make sure it worked properly.  At first, it worked OK.  It was kinda slow, but I expected as much based on the cost.  After a playing with it a few days and testing the battery, the charge port fell out.  It still had some battery life when this happened, but now the device will not even come on.  I am disappointed because I don't want to spend a large sum of money on a table for a 10 year old, but I had to return this item.
Reviews.Title: Not Worth The Money!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "akoblin"
Reviews.Content: Even though I had low expectations for this tablet, I was surprised to find it was much worse than i thought.  Save your money - spend another $50 and buy a better tablet.This is virtually unusable
Reviews.Title: Very disappointed

Reviews.Author: Anna Banana
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for someone who is constantly on the move.  When he's home, he uses his desktop computer, but he needed something more portable.  The price was great.  I hope to see it soon and see how it compares with my pricier tablet.
Reviews.Title: Ematic Genesis Prime Tablet

Reviews.Author: John Dillender
Reviews.Content: Not perfect, but would buy again and recommend to friends.  Especially good value for kid use; price vs breakage/loss is worth the risk.
Reviews.Title: Meets all expectations.

Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The restrictions on it's use are such that I should have waited until I could afford an ipad or amini.
Reviews.Title: Wait!!

Reviews.Author: aka10003
Reviews.Content: This is a good tablet for $80 -- it comes in fun colors (mine is red), and it does the job. It does feel a bit slower than I would like, but then again, hello, it is low-cost.I ultimately bought this as a TV companion -- a way to keep up with the programs I watch. This tablet is mostly doing the job. At times I still have to rely on a laptop as some links are problematic, but less so than in my smartphone. But I am also assuming that some of these issues will happen in premium tablets.All in all -- a good purchase.
Reviews.Title: A good low-cost tablet

Reviews.Author: bilal khan
Reviews.Content: it doesn't work and i don't know how to return it. don't trust any non brand name tablets. i don't like it
Reviews.Title: bad deal.

Reviews.Author: nateddog
Reviews.Content: this is NOT 4gb mine says 1.29gb internal storage. is slow to function. ONE camera for a new tablet thats pretty pathetic
Reviews.Title: meh!!

Reviews.Author: Monty Shaw
Reviews.Content: The product features show that this is has an A4 processor and then the technical details that it is an Intel Core Duo? What?Also no mention of capacitive vs resistive touch technology.Features show 4G flash, tech details says 8G drive. I think it just has 4GAlso CNet says this has a SD slot for up to 32G additional flash.Finally there is no other way for me to report issues with an Amazon product listing other than this. Come on Amazon.
Reviews.Title: Specs are mixed up

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.1 Jelly Bean, 7.0 inches Display
1.1 GHz ARMv7
4 GB Flash Memory, 0.5 GB RAM Memory
4.5-hour battery life, 0.6 pounds
ProductInfo.Name: Ematic EGS004-BU 7.0-Inch 4GB Genesis Prime MultiTouch Tablet (Blue)
